overview: Dr. Pimiento’s research focus is in the treatment of gastrointestinal malignancies, studying the outcomes related with minimally invasive approaches for their treatment, also in identifying clinical, pathologic and molecular factors related to tumor behavior that will impact the response to different treatment modalities. His translational research is focused on chemoprevention of upper gastrointestinal malignancies.
research_interests:
Dr. Pimiento’s research focus is in the treatment of gastrointestinal malignancies, studying the outcomes related with minimally invasive approaches for their treatment, also in identifying clinical, pathologic and molecular factors related to tumor behavior that will impact the response to different treatment modalities.
